data.message: While you're continuing to improve your newsfeeds, I would so appreciate seeing you completely eliminate two things: the Suggested Groups bar that crops up out of nowhere whem we're reading our friends entries of our own choosing, whichh cann be next to impossible to click out; aannd the equally annoying, and potentially endless list of 'People you may know' feature. 😑 We should be given the choice to exit, or opt out of many more of these kinds of nuisances than we are currently.

replies.message: Hey Annie. We work hard to make everyone's experience on Facebook as enjoyable as possible, so please share your feedback with us here: http://bit.ly/2dQ35yQ. -Elizabeth

Facebook You see? It's things like this.. I just DiD "Share (my) feedback", and yet I'm asked to go through another hoop, where I'll be taken through still more hoops. Again VERY aggravating. YOU ARE Facebook. YOU should consolidate, and STOP the Red Tape we are led through, often leading nowhere, submitting our concerns to the proper channels yourSELF.
Facebook you suck. Ad usual things are words. top trying to make things hetter
